Name: Harpocrates between Isis and Nephthys
Description: This small faience amulet depicts Harpocrates between the sister goddesses Isis and Nephthys. The figures are striding on a pedestal. At the top of the rectangular back pillar is a protuberance for suspension.The duality of the sisters is here extended to include the child Horus, whom they have put between them in order to protect him. The deceased, who would wear this amulet, would act as the reborn Osiris.
